alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mojave Desert, Including the Mojave National Preserve; Morongo Basin; Western Mojave Desert (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 19 at 10:42AM PST until November 20 at 6:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Northwest or north winds winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph through Monday afternoon. * WHERE...Eastern Mojave Desert, Morongo Basin, and Western Mojave Desert. * WHEN...Until 6 PM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles and motorcycles. Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution if driving high profile vehicles or motorcycles. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mojave Desert, Including the Mojave National Preserve; Morongo Basin; Western Mojave Desert
